item.title: Const Value of GoRuntime
item.description: 最近在看Go Runtime源码的时候，发现很多字面量，比较有意思。 PtrSize = 4 1 2 const PtrSize = 4 << (^uintptr(0) >> 64) // unsafe.Sizeof(uintptr(0)) but an ideal const Map bucketCntBits = 3 桶个数占位数 bucketCnt = 1 << bucketCntBits = 8 桶
